<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs=""
>
[Bloodeye Coffee](/Equipment.aspx?ID=623)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Drug" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=261" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 120</row>

**Price** 5 sp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A strong blend including several spices common in the Padishah Empire of Kelesh, bloodeye coffee is a favorite morning drink across the Inner Sea region. The maximum addiction stage of bloodeye coffee never progresses beyond stage 1.

**Saving Throw** DC 14 Fortitude; **Onset** 10 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 8 hours; **Stage 1** +1 item bonus to AC and saves to which you are taking penalties caused by the [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) condition (10 minutes); **Stage 2** [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 hour); **Stage 3** can’t recover from fatigued (1 day, after which the drug ends)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Bloodeye Coffee
